CustomField.description: Manually populate this text field with the name of a field set that contains the fields that should appear on an offer. When the terms of the product are updated, the populated fields allow for the dynamic display of offers.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Manually populate this text field with the name of a field set that contains the fields that should appear on an offer. When the terms of the product are updated, the populated fields allow for the dynamic display of offers.
CustomField.label: Offer Field Set
